#summary Other Open Source Emulators

= Spectrum Emulators =

  * http://fuse-emulator.sourceforge.net/
  * GP2XPectrum
    * http://wiki.gp2x.org/wiki/GP2Xpectrum - GP2X 
    * http://dl.openhandhelds.org/cgi-bin/caanoo.cgi?0,0,0,0,46,462 Caanoo version of GP2XPectrum has some SDL code (and some Linux specific stuff, like keyboard and sound).
  * http://code.google.com/p/unrealspeccyp - Unreal Speccy Portable (pure) SDL, zx81 and 128K support, partial disk support (no DSK support)
  * http://sz81.sourceforge.net - SDL based, zx81 ONLY
  * http://code.google.com/p/xpectrum/ -- (more) portable version of GP2XPectrum

= Z80 CPU Emulators =

  * http://caesar.logiqx.com/php/library.php?id=raze - RAZE (Multi Asm Z80 Engine), used in this project for x86 when asm is available
  * http://www.zophar.net/z80.html
